item.description:
NOTE!! only those people "attending" should come, seats and waitstaff are limited.-- another Snob meetup is Apr 29. Please sign up then instead, or on May 20 if you're on the waiting list.

Join us for another Fun snob appreciation endeavor, in the heart of intellectual razzmatazz, Harvard Sq, APRIL FOOLS ED!! Be there or be Sq!

Grendels has a glorious & ever-popular half price food menu, (with the purchase of a $3.50 drink) but get your order in early, we'll be settling the tab around 7 PM. 

You don't have to be a genuine snob to join. Pseudo-intellectuals are also welcome. All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony and some baffling intellectual ideas, or--dare I say it--unanswered questions you wish to convey incognito. 

The premise is that you share your intellectual snob idea or question on a name tag (provided) and attach such tag to your shirt, OR chuck such idea or question in a basket in our midst which will be provided and passed around (please pass it around!)

When this deed is done, pluck from the basket & discuss. This may lead to much laughter but others may be baffled & perhaps enlightened.

True, or April Fools?: --Flying bicycles were invented 200 years ago-- Russian scientists plan to clone a Woolly Mammoth --Efficient free energy cars were very in vogue in the 1930's. Some of them could fly. --Some wild/ domestic animals routinely get drunk. It is legal to add Isinglass-- fish bladder extract-- and 49 other unlisted ingredients--to wine.

Humor in good taste: ALLOWED. Intellectual apparel is allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, periwig, or monocle. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes please. Absinthe is not served.

Take heed, do not attempt to be late. Service quality diminishes after 5:30. Grab the seats while the waitstaff are waiterly. Be patient, these seats are first come first serve. Like a genuine snob, try to get your order in when others do.

Please bring cash. Separate tabs are not encouraged!

When settling the tab, make sure and add 25% of what you are spending for tax and tip!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me w/ a nerdy black tie. Or look for a silver basket on a big table.
item.name: Intellectual Snob Meetup--April Fools Day Ed.
